item.title: GraphQL Schema breaking changes
item.description: Changes history of deprecated notes previously announced Unreleased Removal of organization from PaymentXBookingInfoFilterInput. Reason: Please use PaymentXBookingInfoCriteriaInput. Deprecated on 2018-08-03.Expected removal on 2018-11-01. Removal of pointOfSaleCode from PaymentXBookingInfoFilterInput. Reason: Please use PaymentXBookingInfoCriteriaInput. Deprecated on 2018-08-03.Expected removal on 2018-11-01. Removal of bookingReference from PaymentXBookingInfoFilterInput. Reason: Please use PaymentXBookingInfoCriteriaInput. Deprecated on 2018-08-03.Expected removal on 2018-11-01. 2018-08-03 Deprecated pointOfSaleCode from PaymentXBookingInfoFilterInput. Reason: Please use PaymentXBookingInfoCriteriaInput. Finally removed on 2018-07-31 .
